#summary Choose plug-in description

== Introduction ==

The plug-in adds a button, allowing comfortable navigation on a file system, to the torrent addition dialogue. Of course, only those directories would be shown in a dropdown list, in which rTorrent can create files. And which are allowed for viewing to the web server user.
